Title: Relates to granting police officer status to certain employees of the Triborough bridge and tunnel authority; repealer
Summary: Relates to granting police officer status to bridge and tunnel officers, sergeants and lieutenants of the Triborough bridge and tunnel authority.
LawCode: Amd ยง1.20, rpld ยง2.10 sub 20, CP L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the criminal procedure law, in relation to granting police officer status to certain employees of the Triborough bridge and tunnel authority; and to repeal certain provisions of such law relating thereto
